title: Agarest Generations of War 2-FLT
description:
In Their 28th Year Of Glory, FairLight Released #1079

Agarest: Generations of War 2 (c) Ghostlight LTD: Supplied by: FAIRLIGHT: Release Date: 19/02/2015: Cracked by: FAIRLIGHT Game Type: jRPG
Packaged by: FAIRLIGHT Image Format: ISO
DISCS: 1 Protection: Steam

System Requirements: Nobody knows!

Game information:

Following the huge successes of the number 1 Steam top selling epic SRPG
Agarest: Generations of War and its prequel Agarest: Generations of War
ZERO, Ghostlight are proud to release the massively updated sequel to the
series, Agarest: Generations Of War 2!

This sequel was previously only available on PlayStation 3 but now comes
to STEAM bringing with it a host of new features, visual improvements and
an enticing blend of in-depth strategy and multi-generational
storytelling!

Agarest: Generations of War 2 is set in a parallel world to the previous
two Agarest titles and has a completely new multi generational story and
universe to explore. So while existing fans of the series will of course
see some familiar features and faces popping up, newer players will not
need to have played the previous games to understand and enjoy this
instalment of the story

Installation Information:

* Burn or mount
* Install
* Play the game

NOTE: As usual, block the game exe in your firewall

/TEAM FAiRLIGHT

QUALITY, TRADITION AND PRIDE
